Solution:
There are $5$ yellow pegs, $4$ red pegs, $3$ green pegs, $2$ blue pegs, and $1$ orange peg to be placed on a triangular peg board. We can place the pegs in any order, so the number of ways to place the pegs is $5! \cdot 4! \cdot 3! \cdot 2! \cdot 1! = 28800$. However, we need to subtract the number of ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in a row or column.

To subtract the number of ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in a row or column, we can first count the number of ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in a row or column, and then subtract that number from $28800$.

There are $5$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in the first row. There are $4$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in the second row. There are $3$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in the third row. There are $2$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in the fourth row. There are $1$ way to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in the fifth row. So, there are $5 \cdot 4 \cdot 3 \cdot 2 \cdot 1 = 120$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in a row.

There are $5$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in the first column. There are $4$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in the second column. There are $3$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in the third column. So, there are $5 \cdot 4 \cdot 3 = 60$ ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in a column.

Therefore, the number of ways to place the pegs so that there are two or more pegs of the same color in a row or column is $120 + 60 = 180$. So, the number of ways to place the pegs so that no (horizontal) row or (vertical) column contains two or more pegs of the same color is $28800 - 180 = \boxed{28620}$.
Final Answer: $\boxed{28620}$. I hope it is correct.
